label: Real-time Log Analytics
description: Real-time log analytics and log indexing is the most common use case for processing machine-generated logs. Log analytics provides insights into how users are using your application or how devices are performing in the field. Real-time analytics provides insights as soon as they happen providing faster response times. This use case requires a running instance of Elastic Search 1.6.
author: Cask

arguments.name: steps
value: Download the sample access log from http://market.cask.co/preview/v1/packages/realtime-log-ingestion/1.0.0/logdata.txt
Take note of the directory you downloaded the file to. It will need to be specified as the 'inputdir' argument when starting the pipeline.
